{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LG-Ericsson |model=WBR-5050 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/17/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR7260 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192DE |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.lgericssonus.com/jsp/lgnortel/global/global.product.readProduct.laf?mid=2&openId=3&sid=1&level=3&ca_id1=79&ca_id2=91&item_id=94&item_dtl_id=94# Product page]
[http://www.lgericssonus.com/jsp/lgnortel/global/global.product.readProduct.laf?mid=2&openId=3&sid=1&level=3&ca_id1=79&ca_id2=91&item_id=94&item_dtl_id=94# Manual] (dated August 2011) OEM Senao ([[EnGenius ESR7750G]]) While the FCC photos are not sufficient, this device appears to be RTL8198 based. The manual indicates that the default SSID patterns are '''LG-EricssonXXXXXX''' for both bands. Probable B4:0E:DC OUI.. ==Images== File:LG-Ericsson_WBR-5050_main.jpg|main [[Has images::external| ]]
